item.title: 【UPSCALED】Linkin Park X Steve Aoki - A Light That Never Comes [4K AI Upscale HEVC 10-bit / PCM 24-bit / DTS-HD MA 5.1]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic, Rock
Style: Alternative Rock, Electro House
Year: 2013
Video Source: Vimeo
Audio Source: Qobuz, DTS Blu-ray Music Demo Disc 14

"A Light that Never Comes" is a song by American alternative rock group Linkin Park with American electro house producer Steve Aoki. It was written by Chester Bennington, Mike Shinoda and Aoki and produced by the latter two for the second remix album Recharged, which was released on October 31, 2013. The single was launched via Facebook and the official LP Recharge website on September 12, 2013, as well as a stream on demand via Xbox Music. It was Linkin Park's first electro house song, but according to Shinoda a one-off experiment.

Vocalists Shinoda and Bennington appeared on stage during Aoki's set at Japan's Summer Sonic festival on August 10, 2013. Bennington sang and Shinoda rapped on the single's live debut. Prior to this performance, both Linkin Park and Aoki hadn't said a word about the collaboration.

A few weeks later, the band announced that the song could be unlocked in the Facebook game Linkin Park Recharge, which was yet to be released. This adventure game was put online on September 12. It was also announced that the song would be released as the lead single from the remix album Recharged.

On October 6, 2013, Joe Hahn confirmed a video for "A Light That Never Comes" is in production, by posting two behind the scenes pictures, and a short video preview on his Instagram account. The video was released a couple of days later, albeit on several sites across the world appealing to their respective regions only. The music video was then officially released worldwide on YouTube on October 17, 2013. A behind-the-scenes feature of the video is on Dell's official website. It features the band and a statue of Steve Aoki in a cyber world along with an unnamed actress.

As of June 2023, the music video for "A Light That Never Comes" has over 39.3 million views on YouTube.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and encoded to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track is lossless (Qobuz, HiRes 24-bit), synced with Adobe Audition.
The DTS-HD MA track is ripped from Blu-ray and synced by muxing.
The timed lyrics are synced and edited to match the music video.
Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
